examples: Although the evidence for real Amazons is thin, women athletes are often dubbed amazons .

definitions.definition: a fairy chess piece which combines the moves of the queen and the knight
a position for vaginal sex in which the insertive partner lies on their back with their knees pulled back , and the receptive partner, facing the other person, squats onto the penis
